author: _shemnon
content: Who controls access to the discord group affiliations?  what is the update process and protocol?

author: ajsutton
content: I think it needs to be a mod that updates the role.  Typically to add someone we'd want confirmation from someone already on the team. Removing a role would be either by request of the person its removing it from or from one of the team leads informing us they no longer work there or whatever.

author: _shemnon
content: Can the Ipsilon group be sorted below the EF group then, since it no longer implies EF employment?  Also, the EF layoffs are not reflected in current group membership.

author: ajsutton
content: Changed the ordering (cc <@&595685821026271242> please yell if I shouldn't have). Will follow up with EF folks about reflecting the EF layoffs.
